title: Bind SkPictureShader
body:
**Description of changes**

Allow create shaders from SKPicture

- Related to issue #969 

**API Changes**

Added: 
 
- `sk_shader_t SkiaApi.sk_shader_new_picture(sk_picture_t src, SKShaderTileMode tmx, SKShaderTileMode tmy, ref SKMatrix matrix, ref SKRect tile)`
- `SKShader SKShader.CreatePicture (SKPicture src, SKShaderTileMode tmx, SKShaderTileMode tmy, SKMatrix localMatrix, SKRect tile)`
- 'SKShaderTest.CanDrawWithCreatePictureShader()'

**Behavioral Changes**

As mentioned in [issue](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/issues/969#issuecomment-535925348): existing native libraries already support this changes!

**PR Checklist**

- [x] Has tests
- [x] Rebased on top of master at time of PR
- [ ] Changes adhere to coding standard
- [ ] Updated documentation

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body:
I JUST did this, so sorry. Hopefully it is not too painful - you are going to be a guinea pig on this. Sorry.

You _should_ just be able to run this command in the SkiaSharp root:

```
dotnet run --project=utils/SkiaSharpGenerator/SkiaSharpGenerator.csproj -- generate --config binding/libSkiaSharp.json --skia externals/skia --output binding/Binding/SkiaApi.generated.cs
```

That just builds and runs the generator.

To fix the conflicts, just replace with entire contents with https://raw.githubusercontent.com/mono/SkiaSharp/master/binding/Binding/SkiaApi.cs

After all this, you should end up with your new API in the generated file.
